UserLeap | Full-Stack Engineer | San Francisco | Full time | Onsite

UserLeap (https://angel.co/userleap) is hiring! Our platform helps SaaS businesses grow their revenue by conducting in-product microsurveys and analyzing the responses. Come join a funded early-stage startup in the fast growing customer experience (CX) management industry.

About you: You're an entrepreneurial engineer who likes having ownership, familiar with React and Node.js and has experience scaling services to millions users.

About the Founder: I'm an experienced product manager and entrepreneur who has been an early employee at 5 acquired startups, including Weebly ($365M) and Vurb ($115M).

Interested? Shoot me a note and let's chat: ryan@userleap.com
